com.interface21.context
Interface ApplicationListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicationEventMulticaster
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleListener, PropertyResourceConfigurer, PerformanceMonitorListener
public interface ApplicationListener
extends java.util.EventListener

Interface to be implemented by event listeners. Based on standard java.util base class for Observer design pattern.

Author:
Rod Johnson

Method Summary

          Handle an application event
